sentence: From being greeted by the most attentive valets I have ever seen to check in maid service pool service etc etc
The Grande colonial is your private oasis with quite pool area and interior patio where we had lunch
The bathroom was sizable and had windows that opened into the pool area
The hotel is in 1 minute walking distance to the ocean and even features a nice pool
Nice calm pool

I book at this hotel because the rates are reasonable nice rooms it has all the amenities you look for in a hotel nice pool close to beach superb location in La Jola staff and sales staff are great to work with and finally visitors who stay at the Grande Colonial ask me to book them there again
Pool area private and suitable for lounging around
The grounds were well kept and the pool and the perfect size
Pool is nice small but it was never crowded
Nine Ten Restaurant was convenient and had great chicken fingers off the kid ’s menu and lovely service either on patio or polside
The only reason I did n’t give it a 5 star rating is that the pool is small but being that this hotel is from 1913 they ca n’t really do much to fix this
The pool is very small only 3 feet deep
Heated pool just needs to actually be heated went late August it was freezing no matter what time of day I was in it
The pool is a little small but had lovely padded beds and towels supplied
The hotel website used to also talk about the fact that they did not charge a resort fee which made sense as the Grande Colonial has a very small pool that is 3 feet deep
Unfortunately as we hung by the pool for another hour and a half no one came
The pool area is nice but kinda small to us it did not matter we came to spend time on the beach
reception is personalized our room felt less hotel like and more apartment style and the pool is a round one with no staff on site
We were wondering around the pool area when we talked to the gardener
The pool was not as warm as advertised
